contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Nonoichi |JapaneseName= 野々市市 |settlement_type= City<!--- Leave this line blank for City, the default---> |MapImage= Nonoichi in Ishikawa Prefecture.png |Region= [[Chūbu region|Chūbu]] ([[Hokuriku region|Hokuriku]]) |Prefecture= [[Ishikawa Prefecture|Ishikawa]] |Area_km2= 13.56 |PopDate= February 2011 |Population= 51,976 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees= 36 |LatitudeMinutes= 31 |LatitudeSeconds= |LongtitudeDegrees= 136 |LongtitudeMinutes= 37 |LongtitudeSeconds= |Tree= |Flower= |Bird= |SymbolImage= |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= |CityHallLink= [http://www.city.nonoichi.lg.jp/ City of Nonoichi] }} {{nihongo|'''Nonoichi'''|野々市市|Nonoichi-shi}} is a [[cities in Japan|city]] located in [[Ishikawa Prefecture|Ishikawa]], [[Japan]]. As of February 2011, the city has an estimated [[population]] of 51,976 and a [[population density]] of 3,830 persons per km². The total area is 13.56 km². The town of Nonoichi was located in [[Ishikawa District, Ishikawa|Ishikawa District]], and gained city status on November 11, 2011. Ishikawa District was dissolved as a result.<ref>[http://www.hokkoku.co.jp/subpage/H20110215103.htm 野々市町5万人達成 11月市制施行] by Hokkoku Shimbun, February 15, 2011{{ja icon}}</ref> ==Education== * [[Kanazawa Institute of Technology]] * [[Ishikawa Prefectural University]] ==Sister cities== * {{flagicon|NZL}} [[Gisborne, New Zealand|Gisborne]], New Zealand ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} *[http://www.city.nonoichi.lg.jp/ Nonoichi official website] {{ja icon}} {{Ishikawa}} [[Category:Cities in Ishikawa Prefecture]] {{Ishikawa-geo-stub}}
